Token.Abstract: Library interface to the Oracle Mobile Cloud Location service.
Asynchronously retrieves the asset with the specified ID from the Location service and passes it to the specified completion handler.

Parameter.Name: id_
Parameter.Abstract: The ID of the asset to retrieve from the Location service.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: The block invoked when the request to the Location service is finished. The completion block will be invoked on the main dispatch queue.

Token.Abstract: Builds and returns a new asset query that can be configured to retrieve a set of assets from the Location service.
Asynchronously retrieves the device with the specified ID from the Location service and passes it to the specified completion handler.

Parameter.Name: id_
Parameter.Abstract: The ID of the device to retrieve from the Location service.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: The block invoked when the request to the Location service is finished. The completion block will be invoked on the main dispatch queue.

Token.Abstract: Asynchronously retrieves the devices with the specified beacon from the Location service and passes them to the specified completion handler. Typically there will be only a single device associated with the beacon.

Parameter.Name: beacon
Parameter.Abstract: The beacon of the devices to retrieve from the Location service.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: The block invoked when the request to the Location service is finished. The completion block will be invoked on the main dispatch queue.

Token.Abstract: Builds and returns a new device query that can be configured to retrieve a set of devices from the Location service.
Asynchronously retrieves the place with the specified ID from the Location service and passes it to the specified completion handler.

Parameter.Name: id_
Parameter.Abstract: The ID of the place to retrieve from the Location service.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: The block invoked when the request to the Location service is finished. The completion block will be invoked on the main dispatch queue.

Token.Abstract: Asynchronously retrieves the place closest to the specified geo point from the Location service and passes it to the specified completion handler.

Parameter.Name: point
Parameter.Abstract: The geo point to search out from.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: The block invoked when the request to the Location service is finished. The completion block will be invoked on the main dispatch queue.

Token.Abstract: Asynchronously retrieves the places in the specified geo fence from the Location service and passes them to the specified completion handler.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: The block invoked when the request to the Location service is finished. The completion block will be invoked on the main dispatch queue.

Token.Abstract: Builds and returns a new place query that can be configured to retrieve a set of places from the Location service.
